description: A playful take on words, associating the tomato's redness with embarrassment upon seeing salad dressing.
title: Shy Tomato
n_1: Tomato shyly hangs on the vine, peeking at Salad being prepared.
c1_1: Why am I feeling so red?
n_2: Salad gets tossed with various dressings, oblivious to Tomato's gaze.
n_3: Tomato turns redder as the dressing pours on Salad.
n_4: Tomato blushes deeply, hiding behind a leaf.
c1_4: It's embarrassing, but I blushed seeing the salad dressing!
c2_4: Oh, you're such a shy tomato!
